detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: With over 100 years of collective experience, Shea & Shea specializes in brain and spinal injury cases, demonstrating a deep understanding and expertise in handling complex personal injury claims.

detailsData.title: Proven Results
detailsData.content: Shea & Shea has successfully recovered millions of dollars for their clients through settlements and verdicts, showcasing their ability to achieve significant financial compensation for those they represent.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Support
detailsData.content: The firm offers a wide range of personal injury services, from spinal cord and brain injuries to wrongful death and slip-and-fall accidents, ensuring clients receive specialized legal support.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: Shea & Shea is dedicated to treating clients like family, providing personalized attention and compassionate support throughout the legal process to help victims rebuild their lives.

address: 2007 West Hedding Street #100 San Jose, CA 95128
subHeading: Personal Injury Experts in the Bay Area for Almost 60 Years.
valueProp: Since we opened our doors back in 1966, Shea & Shea has specialized in representing injury victims. Our San Jose personal injury lawyers have years of combined experience successfully representing clients against corporations, manufacturers as well as other individuals. We focus on spinal and brain injuries, but we also help clients that have been involved in a variety of accidents and suffered different types of physical, emotional, and financial damages.

testimonalData.text: Thank you for treating our family like your family. We will always be grateful of your service, generosity, and professionalism.
testimonalData.author: BRENT

testimonalData.text: How can I express the words to express the way I feel? You have given me back my life.
testimonalData.author: LUC R.

testimonalData.text: Thank you from the bottom of our hearts. We knew we had made the right decision.
testimonalData.author: CLINT & KENNETH M.
